channel.title: Best RSPS currently available?
channel.description: Hey guys, haven't been too active for ages really. Just wanted to know what is in your opinion the best server currently as i can't decide using these shabby top 100's and stuff when they force there users to vote for them... I was used to playing servers like battlescape, pkisle, lembypk etc. Old school but AMAZING servers. Anyone got any reccomendations for me? Please don't post ones that require you to donate for items as i think this is cheap.

item.title: Best RSPS currently available?
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

Every server is the same these days, the only difference is the players. I personally like hades5. One of the best servers no doubt

Read full topic

item.title: Best RSPS currently available?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Well to be quite honest, I’ve heard a lot about this server named Creative-Scape and thought the server was a pure enjoyment because the game frame, items and all that other good stuff is pure 317. When I went online because of it not having all those neat items and what not, about 90-100 players on the server were online, but it’ll grow.

Read full topic

item.title: Best RSPS currently available?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

There is no such thing as a good private server. It was doomed from the start since the standards are below sanity levels.

Read full topic

item.title: Best RSPS currently available?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Then what is a good RSPS?

Read full topic

item.title: Best RSPS currently available?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:7, topic:408459”][quote author=Mopar Helper link=topic=509742.msg3698526#msg3698526 date=1312592849]

I know man, it almost brings me to tears how the private server community has died. I hate all these new pking servers with overloads and turmoil I just preferred servers with old school stuff like in 07-08 there were so many good developers and private servers around it was an alternative to rs that was actually good fun.

Wtf? 07-08 were complete shit servers, and shittier developers. It was a lot better when Delta was over used.

January 08, 2009, 05:30:29 PM

That’s when you joined, so what right do you have to say 07-08 was shit…?

[/quote]
Most of us played server’s before joining.[/quote]
My first visit was in 06, i think late 06 though.
OT
Well… its your opinion tbh. But today, the updates and features are much better, but the community overall is more obnoxious and kiddy like.

Read full topic

@jc22493 wrote:

…content-wise or stability-wise or what?

item.title: Best RSPS currently available?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

It mainly died because those developing grew sick of making updates to server’s cause they could make ten time’s as much for half the work making app’s and stuff like that. All those who created original idea’s and quests and such never got as much money as they should of. Oh well though, I have a feeling RSPS’s will be dying off more soon anyway since they’re getting old.

Read full topic

item.title: Best RSPS currently available?
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

There are no good server’s these days. They’re all 13 year old’s in it for the money and don’t update anything from server’s other then the name or maybe make a crappy mini game.

I know man, it almost brings me to tears how the private server community has died. I hate all these new pking servers with overloads and turmoil I just preferred servers with old school stuff like in 07-08 there were so many good developers and private servers around it was an alternative to rs that was actually good fun.
